name: Flappy Bird (itch) (Gaax Inc.)
description:
Experience Flappy Bird on PC

Warning!       Windows SmartScreen will say you might put your PC at risk but i swear to god it's not a virus.      

Only for Windows.

Release date: January 10 2021

Minimum requirements:

  • OS: Windows XP or newer (32 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD at 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any integrated graphics that support OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 35 MB available space
